subScenes.name: 礼貌问候
subScenes.description: 学生向教务人员礼貌打招呼并说明来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, I'd like to request my official transcript, please.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你好，我想申请一份正式成绩单。

responses.text: Sure! I can help you with that. What's your name?
responses.text_cn: 当然可以！我来帮你。你叫什么名字？

responses.text: Oh okay, transcript? Just give me your ID.
responses.text_cn: 哦，成绩单啊？给我你的学号就行。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用I'd like to...表达礼貌请求

subScenes.name: 询问流程
subScenes.description: 学生询问申请成绩单的具体流程

qaPairs.speakerText: How do I get it processed? Do I need a form?

responses.text: No form needed! Just tell me how many copies and if you need them sealed.
responses.text_cn: 不用填表！告诉我要几份，要不要密封。

responses.text: Yeah, you gotta fill out this paper first.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Just tell me...引导对方直接说明

subScenes.name: 确认份数与密封
subScenes.description: 学生确认所需成绩单份数和密封要求

qaPairs.speakerText: I need three copies, and they must be sealed and signed.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我要三份，必须密封并盖章。

responses.text: Got it! Sealed and signed — three copies. That's standard for abroad apps.
responses.text_cn: 好的！密封盖章，三份，留学申请都这样。

responses.text: Sealed? Hmm, we charge extra for that.

subScenes.name: 确认取件时间
subScenes.description: 学生询问成绩单何时可取

qaPairs.speakerText: When can I pick them up?

responses.text: Usually 3–5 business days. Want express service? That’s 2 days, $10 extra.
responses.text_cn: 通常3到5个工作日。要加急吗？2天，多10美元。

responses.text: In 4 days, come back after lunch.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用When can I...直接问时间

subScenes.name: 礼貌道别
subScenes.description: 学生感谢工作人员并礼貌结束对话

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much for your help!

responses.text: You're welcome! Call if you have more questions.
responses.text_cn: 不客气！有疑问再打电话。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Thanks so much...表达真诚感谢
